definition[0]: to move around like a wheel, or to make something move around like a wheel
example[1]: The restaurant slowly revolves, giving excellent views of the city.
example[2]: Using graphics software, you can revolve the image on the screen.
definition[1]: to make loan repayments of less than the full amount due each month
example[3]: Banks make money on the interest rates they charge cardholders who revolve their balances.
